summary: This is a forwarded email chain from August 2019 regarding a request to run an NCIC (National Crime Information Center) check for an individual at MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York). The request is urgent, asking for it to be done first thing in the morning, with a memo to be completed and signed.

events.title: NCIC Check Request for MCC New York
events.description: An email request is made to run an NCIC check first thing in the morning for an individual at MCC New York and to have a memo completed and signed regarding it.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 11-12, 2019.
It contains an urgent request to run an NCIC check for someone at MCC New York.
The request emphasizes completing the check 'first thing in the morning' and preparing a signed memo.
The timing (August 2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death at MCC New York.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text fragment.
